title: LolReplay Editor?
body: Does anyone know a software i can use that will let me allow to edit lolreplays? Ive tried everything i saw and nothing worked because it had ".webm" I even tried changing it to other kinds of files and didnt work. id appreciate it if someone tells me a software  i can use to edit a replay that is free so i can upload it on youtube and make a montage. Thanks.

replies.body: We don't support third party applications, so I couldn't really suggest anything.  Replays are in testing, so any feedback and issues you have would be invaluable towards making it the best it can be.  Check the [Replays ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips)guide for a full overview of the current system, and share any feedback you have on the [Client Discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards about it.  Thanks for testing!
